spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The orc casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16):

trait.name: Gruumsh's Fury
entries: The orc deals an extra 4 (1d8) damage when it hits with a weapon attack (included in the attacks).

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: The Orc necromantic warchief wields the {@item Wand of Orcus}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The orc makes two attacks with its greataxe or its spear.

action.name: Wand of Orcus
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d12 + 7} necrotic plus {@damage 1d8}) slashing.

action.name: Arcane Burst
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. {@h} 25 ({@damage 4d10 + 3}) necrotic damage.

bonus.name: Summon Undead (1/Day)
entries: The orc magically summons three {@creature skeleton||skeletons} or {@creature zombie||zombies}. The summoned creatures appear in unoccupied spaces within 60 feet of the orc, whom they obey. They take their turns immediately after the orc. Each lasts for 1 hour, until it or the orc dies, or until the orc dismisses it as a bonus action.

bonus.name: Aggressive
entries: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

reaction.name: Grim Harvest (1/Turn)
entries: When the orc kills a creature with necrotic damage, the orc regains 9 (2d8) hit points.
